Make sure to go to the Sheep Festival by 6:00 pm. This is a good opportunity to fish so catch at least 100 plus whatever you need for gifts. Also save Empty Cans for the Witch Princess. textAfterTable: Clear 36% Cloudy 20% Drizzle 16% Rain 12% Summer Hot 50% Clear 28% Cloudy 12% Drizzle 1% Rain 4% Typhoon 5% Fall Hot 17% Clear 42% Cloudy 20% Drizzle 9% Rain 12% Winter Hot 10% Clear 16% Cloudy 24% Snow 40% Blizzard 10% Stamina and Fullness Like previous Harvest Moon games, stamina represents your energy. Using any tool uses up stamina. If your stamina reaches 0, you pass out and lose a day, so you should do everything you can to prevent that from happening. Different types of food recover varying amounts of stamina. Going to sleep at night recovers stamina depending on how much sleep you get. You can also purchase upgrades for your house that recover stamina over a period of time. Stamina starts at 100 but can be increased to 250 with accessories.
